name: Boppana Rao
summary: A results-driven and business minded technology leader with 20+ years of experience in technology and software development. A professional who is passionate about developing people and teams to reach their greatest potential. A thought leader that partners with business to drive strategy from conception to execution. A team player that places a priority on networking, relationship building and diversity to achieve the greatest possible outcome. A progressive technology leader with an innovative and growth mindset.
skills: Building a Culture of Innovation and Engagement

experience.title: Vice President Information Technology - Software Engineering
experience.description: Leads all aspects of IT Application Development and Corporate Systems teams (100+ associates plus consultants) with a $20M budget; drives capital transformative projects for the full software lifecycle; champions Fit for Growth; oversees cloud and microservices/containers-based architecture on AWS; leads robotic process automation (RPA) initiatives with anticipated savings of $2-3M per year.

experience.title: Assistant Vice President - Solutions Delivery
experience.description: Defined and executed product vision for Safelite's core systems architecture to drive growth across 5 national contact centers, 600+ retail locations, 6000 mobile technicians, 90 warehouses, 2 distribution centers, and multiple customer-focused web applications. Drove Agile adoption, built autonomous product teams, and extended core systems for omni-channel service. Led customer engagement initiatives, launched the Road to Innovation program, and delivered the first cloud-based end-to-end claim solution; sunsetted legacy AS-400; oversaw MuleSoft integration.

experience.title: Director Of Technology
experience.description: Managed web-responsive self-service portals for policyholders, agents, claimants and customers; upgraded safelite.com to a modern web interface; increased online conversion/self-service usage from 15% to ~60% in 3-4 years. Led RESTful APIs for carrier ecosystems, implemented end-to-end IVR with partner API integrations, and oversaw inventory management and forecasting systems to Oracle EBS and GAINS.

experience.title: Information Technology Manager
experience.description: Transformed Safelite's systems and IT teams across Safelite Solutions, Safelite AutoGlass and Service AutoGlass; re-platformed legacy systems; led distributed service architecture using .NET; implemented new glass claims management system and migrated 200+ carriers' claim processing from legacy mainframe; designed distributed architecture using .NET C# and SQL Server.

experience.title: Team Lead
experience.description: Led IT teams within Safelite's technology organization (role summarized from resume).

experience.title: Information Technology Consultant
experience.description: Provided information technology consulting and project support during early career at Safelite.
